verses.verse: Elihu<WH453> also proceeded<WH3254>, and said<WH559>,
Allow<WH3803> me a little<WH2191>, and I will show<WH2331> you that I have yet to speak<WH4405> on God<WH433>'s behalf.
I will fetch<WH5375> my knowledge<WH1843> from afar<WH7350>, and will ascribe<WH5414> righteousness<WH6664> to my Maker<WH6466>.
For truly<WH551> my words<WH4405> shall not be false<WH8267>: he that is perfect<WH8549> in knowledge is with you<WH1844>.
Behold<WH410>, God is mighty<WH3524>, and despises<WH3988> not any<WH3524>: he is mighty in strength<WH3581> and wisdom<WH3820>.
He preserves not the life<WH2421> of the wicked<WH7563>: but gives<WH5414> right<WH4941> to the poor<WH6041>.

He withdraws<WH1639> not his eyes<WH5869> from the righteous<WH6662>: but with kings<WH4428> are they on the throne<WH3678>; Yes<WH3427>, he does establish them for ever<WH5331>, and they are exalted<WH1361>.
And if they be bound<WH631> in fetters<WH2131>, and be held<WH3920> in cords<WH2256> of affliction<WH6040>;
Then he shows<WH5046> them their work<WH6467>, and their transgressions<WH6588> that they acted insolently<WH1396>.
He opens<WH1540> also their ear<WH241> to discipline<WH4148>, and commanded<WH559> that they return<WH7725> from iniquity<WH205>.
If they obey<WH8085> and serve<WH5647> him<WH3615>, they shall spend their days<WH3117> in prosperity<WH2896>, and their years<WH8141> in pleasures<WH5273>.
But if they obey<WH8085> not<WH5674>, they shall perish by the sword<WH7973>, and they shall die<WH1478> without knowledge<WH1847>.
But the hypocrites<WH2611> in heart<WH3820> heap up<WH7760> wrath<WH639>: they cry<WH7768> not when he binds them<WH631>.
They<WH5315> die<WH4191> in youth<WH5290>, and their life<WH2416> is among the unclean<WH6945>.
He delivers<WH2502> the poor<WH6041> in his affliction<WH6040>, and opens<WH1540> their ears<WH241> in oppression<WH3906>.

Even so would he have removed<WH5496> you out of the narrow<WH6310> into a broad place<WH7338>, where<WH8478> there is no restriction<WH4164>; and that which should be set<WH5183> on your table<WH7979> should be full<WH4390> of fatness<WH1880>.
But you have fulfilled<WH4390> the judgment<WH1779> of the wicked<WH7563>: judgment<WH1779> and justice<WH4941> take hold on you<WH8551>.
Because there is wrath<WH2534>, beware lest he take you away<WH5496> with his stroke<WH5607>: then a great<WH7230> ransom<WH3724> cannot deliver you<WH5186>.
Will he esteem<WH6186> your riches<WH7769>? no<WH1222>, not gold, nor all the forces<WH3981> of strength<WH3581>.
Desire<WH7602> not the night<WH3915>, when people<WH5971> are cut off in their place<WH5927>.
Take care<WH8104>, regard<WH6437> not iniquity<WH205>: for this have you chosen<WH977> rather than affliction<WH6040>.
Behold<WH410>, God exalts<WH7682> by his power<WH3581>: who teaches like him<WH3384>?
Who has enjoined<WH6485> him his way<WH1870>? or who can say<WH559>, You have done<WH6466> iniquity<WH5766>?
Remember<WH2142> that you magnify<WH7679> his work<WH6467>, which men<WH582> behold<WH7891>.
Every man<WH120> may see<WH2372> it<WH582>; man may behold<WH5027> it afar off<WH7350>.
Behold<WH410>, God is great<WH7689>, and we know<WH3045> him not<WH4557>, neither can the number of his years<WH8141> be searched out<WH2714>.
For he makes small<WH1639> the drops<WH5198> of water<WH4325>: they pour down<WH2212> rain<WH4306> according to the vapor there<WH108>:
Which the clouds<WH7834> do drop<WH5140> and pour<WH7491> upon man<WH120> abundantly<WH7227>.
Also can any understand<WH995> the spreadings<WH4666> of the clouds<WH5645>, or the noise<WH8663> of his tabernacle<WH5521>?
Behold<WH6566>, he spreads his light<WH216> upon it<WH3680>, and covers the bottom<WH8328> of the sea<WH3220>.
For by them judges<WH1777> he the people<WH5971>; he gives<WH5414> food<WH400> in abundance<WH4342>.
With clouds<WH3709> he covers<WH3680> the light<WH216>; and commanded<WH6680> it not to shine by the cloud that comes between<WH6293>.
The noise<WH7452> there showed<WH5046> concerning it<WH4735>, the cattle also concerning the vapor<WH5927>.
